'''Beatrice's Catalyst '''is a [[catalysts|catalyst]] in ''[[Dark Souls]]''.

{{Description
|First paragraph = Catalyst belonging to Beatrice, the rogue witch. Contrasts with Vinheim catalysts. This ancient catalyst shows signs of being used for age-old sorceries. It has passed the hands of many generations to get here.
}}
==Availability==
Found off a corpse (presumably [[Witch Beatrice|Beatrice's]]) along with [[Witch Set|Beatrice's set]] in the [[Valley of the Drakes]] after defeating the [[Four Kings]].

==Characteristics==
Beatrice's Catalyst is nearly identical to the [[Sorcerer's Catalyst]]. The only differences are that the Sorcerer's Catalyst deals slightly more damage with the strong attack but blocks less [[Fire (Damage Type)|fire]] damage.
